items.title: XLP: The Winner Of The Market Rotation
items.description: The market is experiencing a sector rotation from consumer discretionary to consumer staples stocks. See why I'm bullish on XLP ETF.

items.title: Meet the Tariff-Resistant Dow Jones Dividend King Stock That Continues to Crush the S&P 500 in 2025
items.description: The maker of Tide detergent and Dawn dish soap, among other products, has increased its dividend for over 50 years -- earning P&G a coveted spot on the list of Dividend Kings.  Here's why P&G could be a rock-solid stock to buy now, especially for investors worried about an escalating trade war.  At first glance, P&G seems like a high-risk company for trade tensions and currency volatility.
